abilities.name: Exemplar of the Einhyr
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, you can re-roll Charge rolls made for that unit.

abilities.name: Mass Driver Accelerators
abilities.rule: Each time this model ends a Charge move, you can select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of this unit and roll one D6: on a 2-5, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers D3+3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Teleport Crest
abilities.rule: While the bearer is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Deep Strike ability.

abilities.name: Weavefield Crest
abilities.rule: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save.

wargear_abilities.name: Teleport Crest
wargear_abilities.rule: While the bearer is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Deep Strike ability.

wargear_abilities.name: Weavefield Crest
wargear_abilities.rule: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save.

wargear_options: ■ This model’s mass hammer can be replaced with 1 darkstar axe.
■ This model’s weavefield crest can be replaced with 1 teleport crest.
unit_composition:
